author: Staff Reporter
text:
A multipurpose indoor stadium will be built in Perambalur under the auspices of the Sports Development Authority of Tamil Nadu.

The stadium will come up at Thirunagar on the land belonging to the Perambalur municipality. Collector Darez Ahmed gave away the cheque for Rs. 1.5 crore to Kantharuban, Assistant Executive Engineer, Public Works Department, and inspected the site on Monday in the presence of C. Ramesh, Municipal Chairman, and Murali, Municipal Commissioner. The stadium can host a range of sports including badminton, basketball, table tennis, and taekwondo and would have facilities such as galleries and dressing rooms.

The indoor stadium will come up at Thirunagar on the land belonging to the municipality.
title: Multipurpose stadium to be built in Perambalur
